item.title: Tech Stock Troubles, Epstein Fallout, and SF Mayor Daniel Lurie
item.description: The Pivot Tour has landed in Kara's beloved San Francisco! Kara and Scott chat with Mayor Daniel Lurie about the city’s revitalization — and Trump’s threat to send in troops. Then, tech stocks take a tumble, and the fallout from the Epstein emails grows. Plus, Scott gets a surprise visit from someone in his past! Watch this episode on the ⁠⁠Pivot YouTube channel⁠⁠.Follow us on Instagram and Threads at ⁠⁠@pivotpodcastofficial⁠⁠.Follow us on Bluesky at ⁠⁠@pivotpod.bsky... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/pivot

item.title: The Strength of the Few: By James Islington | Book Review Podcast
item.description:
Welcome back to the Booklicious Podcast — the place where stories live, characters breathe, and readers gather to talk about the books that keep us awake at night.


Today, we’re diving into a fantasy novel that has been buzzing across the community: “The Strength of the Few” by James Islington. If you loved The Will of the Many, get comfortable — because this sequel does not just continue the story… it explodes it into something much bigger... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/2928ed20/podcast/rss
